reviews.review_text: I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it. Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned. I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you dont need as many other shops that try to sell you things you dont need. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle. Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service. As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like: Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi G Brenes, Im happy to hear that the Auto Service Team has provided you with such great service over the years and Ill be sure to recognize both Tao and Peter for the extra effort during your recent winter tire purchase. Its great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit. - Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee  Mei Lin  was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Richard! We will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforsts. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you cant go wrong here. Its not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days. Service: Tires
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sebastian! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Talk about above-and-beyond service! Servive Advisor Bill Clarke went out of his way to help me keep my car running, gave realistic advice to determining the priority and schedule proceed. Im also thrilled at the work your mechanics were able to provide. Ill be recommending your service centre to anyone with a vehicle, and you and Bill have secured tjis location a customer for life.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Erika! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: After having a negative experience at the Canadian Tire Auto Centre in North Van on Saturday, the Grandview location has restored my faith in the brand. Stanley was extremely helpful over the phone and I was able to get my car looked at within half an hour of calling. They took my car in right before closing and managed to patch my tire all within about 2 hours of the first phone call (over Easter weekend as well). Any time I have needed work done quickly without breaking the bank, this location has always been wonderful to deal with.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sammie, Thanks for taking the time to provide us with this feedback. Im pleased to hear Stanley was helpful and able to get your vehicle into the shop quickly. Were lucky to have experienced advisors like Stanley on our team. Well see you next time you! Tao, Auto Service Centre

reviews.review_text: Stopped in last min to get some help with some missing lug nuts we discovered after my car started making a horrible sound. Everyone was so lovely and went the extra mile to help us out. The thing that really stood out was just the genuine care and even great conversation!! You have some wonderful, kind hearted people on your team working there! Kudos you rescued us and made our night!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Lauren! We really appreciate the 5 stars and are happy to be able to help you out. Our Auto team will be pleased to know that their efforts were appreciated. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Amanda, Auto Centre Manager

reviews.review_text: I recently bought a second hand Subaru and brought it to Canadian Tire for inspection and service. Whatever it is you need the man to see is Bill Clarke. Bill was professional, efficient and most of all personable when helping me. He took time to explain what service diagnosis was for the car and brought me to the floor to review. Also, he gave, what seemed to me,  honest advice about when certain maintenance did / did not need to be done. Bill Clarke is the man, see him for help with auto related items. Thanks for your help!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing this experience, Jared. We are very fortunate to have team members like Bill who strive to provide a 5-star experience to our customers. Ill be sure to recognize Bill for a job well done. Enjoy your new ride! Chris, General Manager

reviews.review_text: I store my winter tires with this location, and had the check engine light come on just before I was going to get my tires swapped over for the spring. I decided to get the whole car checked over and oil changed, etc. They provide the work order of everything that needed some work and advised what needed to be done immediately vs what could be put off which I really appreciated. I ll definitely be going back for more honest work/repairs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Dan! Im happy to hear you appreciate us outlining the recommended and suggested work for your vehicle on the work order. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Highly qualified and knowledgeable staff. Immediately knew what to do with my complex case of international import. Adjusted appointment and helped immediately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for leaving a 5-star rating, Varun! We appreciate your support and are glad you had a positive experience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Very good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: A go to place for all my vehicle needs... friendly service and the best price Ive seeen for tire storage!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Im happy we were able to help you with your tire storage needs and glad to hear we are your preferred shop. See you next time! - Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: CANADIAN TIRE, BUT EVERYTHING IS FROM CHINA. STILL GOOD STORE THOUGH.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate the 5-stars Kochanski! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Fast and quick service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear you had a fast and quick service experience. Thank you for the positive review, and we hope to continue providing you with great service in the future. Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Love Canada tire! If you need to ask why, just go visit one.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were delighted to hear you love our store William, thanks for the 5-stars. See you next time! CT Grandview Team

reviews.review_text: Always has amazing deals
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating! We appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Always reliable service keeping my vehicle safe and running smooth
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the five-star rating! We really appreciate your feedback. - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Amanda and Chuck did a wonderful job of fixing the problems of my car!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review David Ill be sure to recognize Amanda and Chuck for a job well done. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: Quick no frills service. Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your 5-star experience, Raven. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Very happy with my winter tires this week!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy to hear your winter tires are working well Bri its certainly been quite the week to put them to the test. Stay safe and well see you at your next visit! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Great service with these guys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Eli were glad to hear youre happy with our service. Well see you next time! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Great staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, gaurav! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

reviews.review_text: Good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars Ali, see you next time! - Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: fast pickup service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-stars! Were happy to hear you found the pick-up service fast! Grandview Auto Service Team

reviews.review_text: Awesome service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Bradley! Im happy to hear the team provided awesome service. Tao, Auto Service Manager

reviews.review_text: This is the store closest to me. I used to go to rmd to find a Chinese-speaking staff. I am very happy that now this store has Chinese-speaking staff in order to enhance its service. Amada enthusiastically helped me, so that my business such as car inspection and tire replacement can go smoothly. Not bad
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review our shop and provide this feedback Ramona. Im delighted to hear that Amanda was helpful with your inspection and tire change. We are lucky to have Amanda on our team. We hope to see you again soon. Chris, General Manager
